name: Cat Ball v0.2: The Kickening
description:
Dogs have escaped in the maguffin factory and only you can save the last cat-egg from like being eaten and stuff. You and your sweet kicking skills are our last and only hope!!!

Keep the cat alive by getting it and yourself to the level goals.

-----------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

All controls can be configured via the options menu (press escape)

The defaults are

Keyboard and mouse

MOVE: A + D

JUMP: Left Mouse

KICK: Right Mouse

CANCEL KICK: Mouse button 3

RESTART LEVEL: E

Controller

MOVE:  Left Stick

JUMP: A

KICK: Right Trigger

CANCEL KICK: X

RESTART LEVEL: Left Bumper
---------------------------------------

This was a more fleshed out version of my Ludem Dare 46 entry. See the origional here

Thank you so much for playing!! I would love your feedback in the section below so I can my next project even better.

Thanks!

I used a bunch of art and sounds from people frm the following awesome peeps:

- Level and Character art by 0x72

- Sound FX by OmegaPixelArt

- Music by DOS88

- Font by Void

Code for this project can be found on my github here
